column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////First time here for brunch. Wait supposedly 30-40 minutes
column2: but we were called after 15.  Food was very good. We had the French toast
column6: and my husband had the burger which he devoured
column7: so must be great. Their fries are cut and made in house. Very good. Service was a bit slow
column8: so minus 1 star. We waited about 5 minutes before someone came over to give us water.  Parking is valet
